results.content:
This is an intermediate course. I mean if I didn't know how to code before I probably just copy and don't understand what's going on. But  I give 3 stars because of that. The teacher has a lot of bad coding practices, starting with the CSS is the complete unreal useful case and the script code broke several the number one rule DO NOT REPEAT YOUR SELF.

But for just get an idea of the logic behind a gallery slider is a really nice example. I think everyone who knows the language can improve a lot the script and make very interesting projects. 

Is an educational course no for the real world.

I change my review because when I was making a new code for the gallery I notest that he skips content that he offers: a play/pause button.
